direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods instantiate new objects with similar constructor parameters.
Both methods create objects that interact with financial services, albeit different ones.
Both methods involve creating objects that manage financial resources.

enhanced_by.reason: Setting the showLimitUsage state may affect the behavior of the createGiftCard method.
Setting the proxy may affect the network communication during the creation of the GiftCard.
The Wallet object can be used to verify the state or resources after creating a GiftCard.
